mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make powerful AI translation accessible to everyone, everywhere. We believe that language should never be a barrier to communication, learning, or opportunity.
mission.vision: We envision a world where anyone can instantly understand and communicate in any language, enabling global collaboration and understanding.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: nextai translator was born from a simple observation: while AI translation technology has made incredible advances, most tools were either too expensive, too limited, or too complicated for everyday users. We set out to create a solution that combines the power of cutting-edge AI models with simplicity and accessibility.
